text: Delivery was quicker than expected, and that's about the only positive thing to say. My nachos were bland and mush. His fajitas looked like soup. We will not be ordering from here again.

The boy and I eat here around once or twice a month. I'm not a huge Mexican fan, but this is by far the best Mexican restaurant downtown. It's not Mexico, but it's tasty nevertheless I would recommend it if you are downtown and hankering for some Mexican!
Food is OK.  Female server is great, tries hard.  The male server is disinterested.
I ate here once about 6 years ago and got food poisoning. The thought of Mexican food still turns my stomach. Thanks, Cuzamil.
